trans-unit.source: Manages serialization processes at run time.
trans-unit.target: Gerencia os processos de serialização em tempo de execução.
Essa classe não pode ser herdada.

trans-unit.source: This class performs similar tasks as the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ObjectManager>.
trans-unit.target: Esta classe executa tarefas semelhantes, como o <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ObjectManager>.

trans-unit.source: The main difference is that the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationObjectManager> performs its tasks during serialization while the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ObjectManager> performs its tasks during deserialization.
trans-unit.target: A principal diferença é que o <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationObjectManager> executa suas tarefas durante a serialização durante o <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ObjectManager> executa suas tarefas durante a desserialização.

trans-unit.source: An instance of the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext" /> class that contains information about the current serialization operation.
trans-unit.target: Uma instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext" /> que contém informações sobre a operação atual de serialização.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationObjectManager" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationObjectManager" />.

trans-unit.source: Invokes the OnSerializing callback event if the type of the object has one; and registers the object for raising the OnSerialized event if the type of the object has one.
trans-unit.target: Invocará o evento de retorno de chamada OnSerializing se o tipo do objeto tiver um; e registrará o objeto para gerar o evento OnSerialized se o tipo do objeto tiver um.

trans-unit.source: The OnSerializing callback event is created by applying the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.OnSerializingAttribute> attribute to a method on the registered object.
trans-unit.target: O evento de retorno de chamada OnSerializing é criado aplicando o <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.OnSerializingAttribute> de atributo para um método no objeto registrado.

trans-unit.source: Similarly, the OnSerialized event is created by applying the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.OnSerializedAttribute> attribute to a method on the registered object.
trans-unit.target: Da mesma forma, o evento OnSerialized é criado aplicando o <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.OnSerializedAttribute> de atributo para um método no objeto registrado.

trans-unit.source: Registers the object upon which events will be raised.
trans-unit.target: Registra o objeto após o qual os eventos serão gerados.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationObjectManager.RaiseOnSerializedEvent%2A> method will be called on the registered object.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationObjectManager.RaiseOnSerializedEvent%2A> método será chamado no objeto registrado.
